short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take back your data and take control of your digital footprint while browsing the internet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your privacy matters – own it with Vael.

Exercising your data rights is painstakingly difficult and time-consuming. Vael’s browser extension helps you easily take back your data from companies on the internet. Vael gives you the ability to conveniently submit deletion and "do not sell my information" requests to companies while you browse the internet.

With Vael's browser extension you can simply build your digital asset inventory while browsing the internet, once you have sign up for access to Vael’s Digital Estate tool.

***Permissions granted for Vael’s browser extension are used to help Vael users seamlessly exercise their data privacy rights (i.e., California Privacy Rights Act, CPRA) and build their digital asset inventory. We do not collect, use, or sell your personal information. Your personal information is only used to help you exercise your data privacy rights and build your digital asset inventory.***

Additional information: https://www/vael.co
